original_title: Resurrecting Moton Field: The Birthplace of the Tuskegee Airmen
overview: Resurrecting Moton Field captures the explosive times, the legendary tales and the unbelievable triumphs of the young black men who traveled to this rural strip of land and became the celebrated Tuskegee Airmen.
tagline: Where boys became men, before they became heroes. Every legacy begins somewhere...
title: Resurrecting Moton Field: The Birthplace of the Tuskegee Airmen
